conversations.content:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
tracking_orders contains tables such as products.
Table products has columns such as product_id, product_name, product_details.
List the names of all distinct products in alphabetical order.
select distinct product_name from products order by product_name;
